scripts.postinstall: cd ts-force && npm install && npm run build && cd ../ts-force-gen && npm install
scripts.test: cd ts-force && npm test && cd ../ts-force-gen && npm test
scripts.checkCommitted: git diff-index --quiet HEAD -- || { echo 'ERROR: You have uncommitted changes!  Please commit before publishing...'; exit 1; }
scripts.tag: git add '*package*.json' && git commit -m "published v$npm_package_version" && git tag $npm_package_version
scripts.prepublishOnly: echo 'Code should be published from individual directories' && exit 1
scripts.publishRuntime: cd ts-force && npm version $npm_package_version && npm publish
scripts.publishGen: cd ts-force-gen && npm version $npm_package_version && npm publish
scripts.build: cd ts-force && npm run build && cd ../ts-force-gen && npm run build
scripts.tagNext: npm dist-tag add ts-force@$npm_package_version && npm dist-tag add ts-force-gen@$npm_package_version
scripts.publishBoth: npm run checkCommitted && npm run publishRuntime && npm run publishGen && npm run tag
